title: Microsoft Stream: Steam migration tool for GCC customers
description:
The Stream migration tool will become available
for GCC customers on July 30, 2023. This tool helps admins migrate video and
audio files and related metadata from Stream (classic) to new Stream (on
SharePoint). With the Stream migration tool admins can select some, or all,
video and audio files in Stream (classic) and then move them to SharePoint
folders, SharePoint site collections, or specific OneDrive folders.
